H0.text: which dawkins book to read first. The Blind Watchmaker

H1.text: which dawkins book to read first. The God Delusion

H2.text: which dawkins book to read first. Climbing Mount Improbable

H3.text: which dawkins book to read first. The Selfish Gene

A4.text: The God Delusion was the best-seller in the religion and spirituality category.

A5.text: The Blind Watchmaker was published in 1986, which is earlier than The God Delusion.

A6.text: The Selfish Gene was listed in The Guardian's list of the 100 best nonfiction books in 2016.

A7.text: In July 2017, a poll to celebrate the 30th anniversary of the Royal Society Science Book Prize listed The Selfish Gene as the most influential science book of all time.
